desc: Knit Fit supports knitters who want to be more active. We are committed to wellness as we knit. We enjoy knitting while walking and "getting fit one stitch at a time". We designed a unique Knit Fit bag which contains an instructional guide, hat pattern with Maine yarn, mini scissors, and tips to help you get started.

layout.text: Add Knit Fit to your daily routine and see how quickly your steps and stitches add up!
